allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial release: Schema Injection Service POC

Complete proof-of-concept implementation including:

- Database schema (clients, page_schemas, drift_signals tables)
- 5 Supabase Edge Functions:
  - schema-loader: Returns embeddable JS for client sites
  - get-schema: Serves JSON-LD schemas with caching
  - collect-signal: Receives page content hashes for drift detection
  - update-schema: Creates/updates schemas via authenticated API
  - get-drift: Returns unprocessed drift signals
- RLS policies for security
- Full CORS support for cross-origin requests
- URL normalization and cache invalidation

Deployed and tested on Supabase project: uxkudwzbqijamqhuowly

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Optimize get-schema for performance

- Replace Supabase JS client with direct REST API calls
- Reduces response time by ~25% (285ms median vs 380ms)
- Add CDN-Cache-Control and Surrogate-Control headers
- Add s-maxage for shared cache support

Performance results (20 requests):
- Min: 207ms
- Median: 285ms
- p90: 430ms

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
